784330.name: Visual Novel Maker - VitaminX Collection vol. 2
784330.description:
The elite crew from「VitaminX」is ready to once again take center stage in your non-commercial Visual Novel projects!

From D3 Publishers comes another stylish set of characters and backgrounds from the fan-favorite「VitaminX」universe. The beloved teacher team T6 and student team B6 are ready for action, romance and more! Volume 2 includes sportswear, waiter uniforms, swimwear and formal outfits - along with a variety of expressions and moods. A sparkly ballroom background is there to help you illustrate magnificent dancing, professions of undying love or confrontations between rivals. Whether you want to create just one more adventure for B6 or want to illustrate your own love story, VitaminX Collection vol. 2 is a must-have addition to your Visual Novel asset library.

As a special bonus, Volume 2 includes 6 music tracks that will help you bring your「VitaminX」game to life.

■Characters■

[Student team B6]
・Tsubasa（真壁翼）、Hajime（草薙一）、Shun（七瀬瞬）、Kiyoharu（仙道清春）、Goro（風門寺悟郎）、Mizuki（斑目瑞希）
Love Uniform
Study Uniform
Sportswear
Waiter
Swimwear
Formal
University Student
※Each comes with 9 expressions


・Goro（風門寺悟郎）
Cheerleader
University Student Male

[T6] ※Comes with 9 expressions
・Katsuragi（葛城銀児）、Ootori（鳳晃司）、Kunokage（九影太郎）、Nikaido（二階堂衝）、kinugasa（衣笠正次郎）、Sanada（真田正輝）
